Template_PaneHeight Property

CDXML Name:PaneHeight
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_Template_PaneHeight
CDX Constant Value:0x1000
Data Size:CDXCoordinate
Property of objects:kCDXObj_TemplateGrid
First written/read in:ChemDraw 4.0
Required?Required for templategrids

Description:

The height of the viewing window of a template grid.
